H3.text: what is the third season of total drama. World Tour

A4.text: Total Drama Action is the second season of Total Drama, airing after Total Drama Island.

A5.text: Total Drama Action was created by the makers of 6teen, another Teletoon program.

A6.text: Total Drama: Revenge of the Island is a sequel to Total Drama World Tour, which was the third season of Total Drama.

A7.text: Total Drama: Revenge of the Island features an entirely new cast, which is the first time the series completely replaces every existing cast member with an all-new cast.
